ActCanada-Nova Scotia Offshore Petroleum Resources Accord Implementation Act
SubjectCrown Share Adjustment Payments Regulations
PrecisCROWN SHARE ADJUSTMENT PAYMENT REGULATIONS in order to enable the Minister of Natural Resources to make future Crown Share adjustment payments to the Province of Nova Scotia from the Consolidated Revenue Fund.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0113 Publication Date: 2012-06-20
